categories: Category:Imperial Navy captains of the Galactic Empire
Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Captain Milnn was a Human male Imperial TIE pilot who was the leader of Delta Squadron during the Galactic Civil War.

Milnn and his squad were investigating an Imperial distress signal when they were ambushed by a group of Rebel X-wing fighters. The other members of the squad were killed, but Milnn survived the battle only to be captured and interrogated by the Rebels. The Rebels wanted to know the recognition codes for entrance into the armada commanded by Admiral Mils Giel which was transporting the teezl to the Imperial capital. Milnn refused to cooperate even under threat of a blaster, but he was quick to talk once Chewbacca took over the interrogation.
